item.description:
Meet fellow Wine Enthusiasts near you! Come to a local American Wine Society(AWS) Chapter Wine Meetup to learn about wines/regions/grapes and taste wines at the next level. Everyone's welcome, from new bouquet-sniffers to educated connoisseurs.

Members participate at monthly meetings by bringing appetizers or if requested, a bottle of wine for the monthly theme.
Members are encouraged to attend several monthly meetings throughout the year.
item.name: The AWS Wine Meetup Group
